Athletics

Maryland vs Indiana

Saturday, Oct. 28 / Kickoff TBD / Capital One Field at Maryland Stadium

$25–$50 / The Terps will take on the Indiana Hoosiers—come out and celebrate Terp spirit and Maryland football's 125th anniversary.

Buy Tickets

125th Anniversary of Maryland Football

Since 1892, the Maryland football program has accumulated 11 conference championships, celebrated 11 consensus All-Americans and 16 NFL first-round draft picks, appeared in 27 bowl games and won the 1953 national championship. Find your 125th anniversary  T-shirts and memorabilia at the UMD Bookstore in the Stamp Student Union or shop.umterps.com.

  • Watch Video
  • Visit Anniversary Site →
  • Buy Memorabilia →

125th Anniversary of Maryland Football Video

Wear your pride! Find your 125th anniversary T-shirts and memorabilia at the UMD Bookstore in the Stamp Student Union or at shop.umterps.com.

Game Attendee Parking
With over 50,000+ fans visiting campus, parking becomes an important part of the Game Day experience. If you plan to be driving to campus, please review our Game Day parking policies here

Learn More →

Athletic Events
Football isn't the only reason to cheer at Maryland during Homecoming week! The winning volleyball and powerhouse men's soccer teams host big matches, while the women's basketball team opens its season with an exhibition game.

Learn More →

Terp Alley

Join the Maryland Spirit Squad, Dance Team and Mighty Sound of Maryland as they welcome the Maryland Football team to the stadium prior to the game! Terp Alley will be at Stadium Drive Traffic circle, just outside the West Gate of Capital One field at Maryland Stadium. Also be sure to check out the inflatable games and kids’ activities on Legacy Plaza.
